video_prompt: Chandelier crystals shimmer. Ceiling stars twinkle. Clouds drift around the bed and across the floor. Window curtains sway gently. Sunset colors bleed and shift in the sky. Floating islands slowly traverse the background. Streaks of light (meteors/shooting stars) dart across the sky. Glowing orbs pulsate on the bookcase. Cosmic rug patterns subtly swirl.
image_prompt: Fantasy bedroom, luxurious, celestial, purple and pink. Ornate purple walls, crystal chandelier, starry ceiling. Reflective mirror, crystal-studded purple headboard, white bedding, cloud-like floor puffs. Bedside table with lamp and purple tulips, plush purple/blue armchair. Window with sheer purple curtains, sunset sky, floating islands with greenery, meteoric streaks. Intricate bookcase with glowing or galactic orbs. Cosmic rug (nebulae, stars), more cloud-like floor puffs. Magical, elegant, tranquil, otherworldly.
refined_video_prompt: Chandelier crystals actively shimmer. Ceiling stars softly twinkle. Ethereal clouds gently drift around the bed and flow across the floor. Window curtains gently sway. Sunset hues dynamically bleed and shift across the sky. Floating islands slowly traverse the distant background. Streaks of light (meteors/shooting stars) swiftly dart across the sky. Glowing orbs softly pulsate on the bookcase. Cosmic rug patterns subtly swirl and shift.
